Uses of Package
com.google.code.sli4j.core

Packages that use com.google.code.sli4j.core
com.google.code.sli4j.acl Apache Commons-Logging injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.juli java.util.logging.Logger injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.log4j Apache Log4j injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j SLF4J injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j.jcl SLF4J-Apache Commons-Logging injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j.jdk14 SLF4J-jdk14 injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j.log4j SLF4J-Apache Log4j injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j.logback SLF4J-Logback injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j.nop SLF4J-NOP injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.slf4j.simple SLF4J-Simple injection implementation. 
com.google.code.sli4j.testfw Contains a mini-test framework shared between all the modules. 
 

Classes in com.google.code.sli4j.core used by com.google.code.sli4j.acl
AbstractLoggerInjector
          The abstract Logger injector implementation, takes care of injecting the concrete Logger implementation to the logged filed.
AbstractLoggingModule
          Abstract module implementation of Logging module that simplifies Logger building and injection.
